biotools.summary: BOOSTNANO is a deep learning tool for preprocessing ONT-Nanopore RNA sequencing reads(before basecalling), it segments/trims the adapter, polyA stall, and the transcription from the raw signal before the basecalling.

bioschemas.name: BoostNano
